name: Maze of Flott
overview:
Maze Of Flott is an Action game, developed and published by Taito Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1989.
Traverse a strange and cool city in search of magic keys that will allow you to travel around freely and escape to freedom, beating the game! In the fantastic Maze of Flott you drive around the city streets strategically entering buildings to cruise around their dungeon-like corridors to pick up fuel, find keys and avoid the many hazards and traps! Drive around, gather the keys and avoid hitting any other cool little cars!

More excellently crafted retro racing classics that you'll definitely love ar WipEout XL, Woody Woodpecker Racing and the amazing Moto Racer World Tour.
